package-manager.name: depot
package-manager.title: The Vorbis General Audio Compression Codec
package-manager.description: Ogg Vorbis is a fully open, non-proprietary, patent- and royalty-free, general-purpose compressed audio format for audio and music at fixed and variable bitrates from 16 to 128 kbps/channel.
